languages.text: {n}Дерзкий паренек мрачно улыбается.{/n} "Что бы мы сейчас ни сказали, наших родителей это не вернет. И наши судьбы не изменит. Будем тянуть лямку на этом корабле до смерти и сдохнем, как наши отцы. Или хуже".

{n}The boy smiles grimly.{/n} "It doesn't matter what we say — it won't bring our parents back. And it won't change our fates either. We'll keep slaving away on this ship until we drop and die like our folks. Or worse."
languages.original_text: {n}Дерзкий паренек мрачно улыбается.{/n} "Что бы мы сейчас ни сказали, наших родителей это не вернет. И наши судьбы не изменит. Будем тянуть лямку на этом корабле до смерти и сдохнем, как наши отцы. Или хуже".

traits.locale_text: {n}The boy smiles grimly, not at all like a child.{/n} "It doesn't matter what we say — it won't bring our parents back. And it won't change our fates either. We'll keep slaving away on this ship until we drop and die like our folks. Or worse."
traits.speaker: ArgentaEvent_OrphanBad

traits.locale_text: {n}The boy smiles grimly, not at all like a child.{/n} "It doesn't matter what we say — it won't bring our parents back. And it won't change our fates either. We'll keep slaving away on this ship until we drop and die like our folks. Or worse."
traits.speaker: ArgentaEvent_OrphanBad

traits.locale_text: {n}The boy smiles grimly.{/n} "It doesn't matter what we say — it won't bring our parents back. And it won't change our fates either. We'll keep slaving away on this ship until we drop and die like our folks. Or worse."
traits.speaker: ArgentaEvent_OrphanBad

traits.locale_text: {n}The boy smiles grimly.{/n} "It doesn't matter what we say — it won't bring our parents back. And it won't change our fates either. We'll keep slaving away on this ship until we drop and die like our folks. Or worse."
traits.speaker: ArgentaEvent_OrphanBad

traits.locale_text: {n}The boy smiles grimly.{/n} "It doesn't matter what we say — it won't bring our parents back. And it won't change our fates either. We'll keep slaving away on this ship until we drop and die like our folks. Or worse."
traits.speaker: ArgentaEvent_OrphanBad

traits.locale_text: {n}The boy smiles grimly.{/n} "It doesn't matter what we say — it won't bring our parents back. And it won't change our fates either. We'll keep slaving away on this ship until we drop and die like our folks. Or worse."
traits.speaker: ArgentaEvent_OrphanBad

languages.text: {n}男孩冷硬地笑了起来。{/n}“我们说什么并不重要，反正我们的父母再也回不来了，我们的命运也不会改变。我们会继续在这艘飞船上劳作，直到像我们的家人一样死在这里，或是落得更惨的下场。”
languages.original_text: {n}The boy smiles grimly.{/n} "It doesn't matter what we say — it won't bring our parents back. And it won't change our fates either. We'll keep slaving away on this ship until we drop and die like our folks. Or worse."

traits.locale_text: {n}男孩冷硬地笑着，一点都不像个孩子。{/n}“我们说什么并不重要，反正我们的父母再也回不来了，我们的命运也不会改变。我们会继续在这艘飞船上劳作，直到像我们的家人一样死在这里，或是落得更惨的下场。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaEvent_OrphanBad

languages.text: {n}El joven sonríe, sombrío.{/n} «No importa lo que digamos, porque no nos devolverá a nuestros padres. Tampoco cambiará nuestro destino. Seguiremos trabajando en esta nave hasta que muramos como nuestros padres. O peor».
languages.original_text: {n}The boy smiles grimly.{/n} "It doesn't matter what we say — it won't bring our parents back. And it won't change our fates either. We'll keep slaving away on this ship until we drop and die like our folks. Or worse."

traits.locale_text: {n}El joven sonríe sombríamente, en un gesto muy distinto al de cualquier niño.{/n} «No importa lo que digamos, porque no nos devolverá a nuestros padres. Tampoco cambiará nuestro destino. Seguiremos trabajando en esta nave hasta que muramos como nuestros padres. O peor».
traits.speaker: ArgentaEvent_OrphanBad

languages.text: {n}少年は苦々しい笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「何を言っても、お父さんとお母さんは戻ってこないんだ。僕らの運命も変わらない。お父さんたちのように、落ちて死ぬまでこの船で働き続けるんだ。あるいはもっと酷い結末を迎えるまで」
languages.original_text: {n}The boy smiles grimly.{/n} "It doesn't matter what we say — it won't bring our parents back. And it won't change our fates either. We'll keep slaving away on this ship until we drop and die like our folks. Or worse."

traits.locale_text: {n}少年は苦々しい笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「何を言っても、お父さんとお母さんは戻ってこないんだ。僕らの運命も変わらない。お父さんたちのように、落ちて死ぬまでこの船で働き続けるんだ。あるいはもっと酷い結末を迎えるまで」
traits.speaker: ArgentaEvent_OrphanBad

languages.text: {n}Der Junge lächelt grimmig.{/n} "Es spielt keine Rolle, was wir sagen – es bringt unsere Eltern nicht zurück. Und es wird auch nichts an unserem Schicksal ändern. Wir werden weiter Sklaven auf diesem Schiff sein, bis wir umfallen und sterben wie unsere Leute. Oder schlimmer."
languages.original_text: {n}The boy smiles grimly.{/n} "It doesn't matter what we say — it won't bring our parents back. And it won't change our fates either. We'll keep slaving away on this ship until we drop and die like our folks. Or worse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Junge lächelt grimmig, überhaupt nicht wie ein Kind.{/n} "Es spielt keine Rolle, was wir sagen – es bringt unsere Eltern nicht zurück. Und es wird auch nichts an unserem Schicksal ändern. Wir werden weiter Sklaven auf diesem Schiff sein, bis wir umfallen und sterben wie unsere Leute. Oder schlimmer."
traits.speaker: ArgentaEvent_OrphanBad

languages.text: {n}Le garçon affiche un sourire sombre.{/n} « On peut bien dire ce qu'on veut, ça ne ramènera pas les morts et ça ne changera pas non plus notre sort. On va continuer à trimer comme des esclaves sur ce vaisseau, jusqu'à ce qu'on crève comme nos parents, ou pire. »
languages.original_text: {n}The boy smiles grimly.{/n} "It doesn't matter what we say — it won't bring our parents back. And it won't change our fates either. We'll keep slaving away on this ship until we drop and die like our folks. Or worse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le garçon affiche un sourire sombre qui ne semble pas à sa place sur le visage d'un enfant.{/n} « On peut bien dire ce qu'on veut, ça ne ramènera pas les morts et ça ne changera pas non plus notre sort. On va continuer à trimer comme des esclaves sur ce vaisseau, jusqu'à ce qu'on crève comme nos parents, ou pire. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaEvent_OrphanBad

languages.text: {n}Oğlan tatsızca gülümsüyor.{/n} "Ne dediğimizin ne önemi var? Ebeveynlerimizi geri getirmeyecek. Kaderimizi de değiştirmeyecek. Ailelerimiz gibi biz de yitip gidene kadar bu gemide ömür çürüteceğiz. Belki daha beterini yaşayacağız."
languages.original_text: {n}The boy smiles grimly.{/n} "It doesn't matter what we say — it won't bring our parents back. And it won't change our fates either. We'll keep slaving away on this ship until we drop and die like our folks. Or worse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Oğlan tatsızca gülümsüyor.{/n} "Ne dediğimizin ne önemi var? Ebeveynlerimizi geri getirmeyecek. Kaderimizi de değiştirmeyecek. Ailelerimiz gibi biz de yitip gidene kadar bu gemide ömrümüzü çürüteceğiz. Başımıza daha beter şeyler de gelebilir."
traits.speaker: ArgentaEvent_OrphanBad
